title: Play Ball
synopsis: After fracturing a finger in a junior high school game, Takao Taniguchi is unable to play baseball. After entering Sumitani High School, he is constantly watching the baseball club even though he is unable to play. He catches the eye of the captain of the soccer club, and while he still has lingering hopes of joining the baseball club, he decides to join the soccer club.
voices: ['Fukui, Shinsuke', 'Taketani, Kazuki', 'Taniguchi, Yuuki', 'Satou, Michiru', 'Ogihara, Hideki', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi']
